long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gold Miner is an absolute classic. In the game that dates from the early 2000s, you collect gold, stones, and minerals to reach your daily goal. With the money you collect you can buy upgrades such as explosives, which let you mine more efficiently.
